rules_text:
First strike
[i]Tricky Business [/i]– Whenever Anna, Traveling Trickster attacks, exile the top card of each player's library. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Anna attacks and isn't blocked, create a Treasure token.
[i]Lucky Seven[/i] – As long as you control seven or more artifacts, Treasures you control have “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
